title: AnandamE paramAnandamE
sahitya:
AnandamE paramAnandamE ayyan abhaya varakkaiyan tiru naTanam


anupallavi

  mAnilattil sakala jIvanum uyya makkaL
 Unak-kaNgaL amrta pAnam sheyyak-kiDaitta


caraNam    pAdi matiyum prabhAkara vaDivum pAl niramum tavazh pArvati magizh-
krpAnidhi ponnambalattADum- sabhApati madurai veLLiyambalam tannil
dhIm dhit-taLAngu takajhaNutOm takajaNu tadhimi takiTajhaNaku taNaku
tatvam eRa ainkAramum Duku Dum Dum Dum enra udukkaiyin OmkAramum tan
padayugaLa shen tAmarai paNivar cintAkulam aghala tandOm padaviyenum
